name: Everyone Loves Active 2
description:
A pretty weird shmup about blowing things up with curving bullets, and having those explosions create more explosions, I think.

This was originally created for a TIGSource competition many moons ago.

My brain was in a pretty weird state when I made this.

Credits

  • Game by Kyle Pulver
  • Music by Alec Holowka

Notice

The leaderboards for the game are down indefinitely, sorry!
